## floatToHalf() function

Converts float value to half float

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function floatToHalf(val: number): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

val


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The float value to be converted.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

A 16-bits integer presents the half float value
